Key Responsibilities: ✔️ Plan, schedule, and manage projects for timely delivery ✔️ Define scope, goals, deliverables & success criteria ✔️ Collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, design, QA, ops) ✔️ Monitor progress, manage risks & dependencies ✔️ Communicate updates to stakeholders ✔️ Track project performance & drive improvements Qualifications: 🔹 3+ years of Project Management experience (technical/digital preferred) 🔹 Strong PM methodologies knowledge 🔹 Excellent communication & leadership skills 🔹 Ability to manage both technical & non-technical teams Apply now by sending your portfolio & resume to: hr@techsolutionspro.co.uk Location: Gulberg Greens, Islamabad

Junior Graphic Designer

Posted: 2025-10-01

Expires: 2025-10-15

Active
🚨 We’re Hiring – Junior Graphic Designer (Product Mockups) Do you have an eye for detail and mastery of Photoshop? We’re looking for a detail-obsessed Graphic Designer to create high-quality, realistic product mockups. 📍 Location: Gulberg Greens, Islamabad 🕒 Full-time | Onsite What You’ll Do: ✨ Build clean, organized PSDs with Smart Objects ✨ Apply designs using Displace, Warp, Puppet Warp, Blend-If, and Masks to follow fabric folds, seams & lighting ✨ Ensure artwork looks realistic, premium, and shop-ready ✨ Keep files structured and production-ready What We’re Looking For: ✔ Strong Photoshop skills (fundamentals + advanced tools) ✔ Eye for detail, alignment & realism ✔ Fast, reliable, and organized ✔ Portfolio of product mockups/visualization work ➕ Basic Illustrator, light retouching, and ecommerce/apparel experience is a plus Perks & Benefits: Market-competitive salary Bonuses (referral & appreciation) Insurance coverage If you’re passionate about turning ideas into visuals that sell, we’d love to hear from you! 📩 Send your CVs at: adil_wajeeh@skyscrapersnow.com
📍 Islamabad#Junior Graphic Designer🧳 Experienced Required
